projects.title: INHALE / EXHALE
projects.description: An ambisonic solo vocal performance with electronics. Developed in Python and SuperCollider.

projects.title: AIRWAVE
projects.description: A granular synthesis controller composed of a Leap Motion sending data collected through Python to SuperCollider via OSC.

projects.title: LBHRTAM
projects.description: Cheap binaural ambisonic monitoring by strapping a smartphone to your head. Rotational information collected from an Android app passed to SuperCollider via OSC.

projects.title: FPGA Looper
projects.description: A 4-channel looper with pitch shifting and distortion sound effects implemented on an FPGA.
